short_summary: Requirement for drive on dock with installation at HMCS DISCOVERY
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the supply and delivery of a drive on dock.
full_summary:
# tenderAnnouncement

### title
Drive on Dock: Request for Proposal
### Reference
WS3745274647

### Tender Number
WS3745274647-Doc4017409562
### Date Notice Published
May 19, 2023
### Date Tender Closes
May 23, 2023 (14:00 EST)
### Regions of Operation
British Columbia
### Regions of Delivery
British Columbia
### Contact Information
Name: Parsons, Mary (SPAC/PSPC)
Contact Email: [mary.parsons@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:mary.parsons@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Tender Description

The Department of National Defence requires a drive on dock capable of meeting operational and training needs at HMCS Discovery. The HMCS Discovery must be equipped with a drive on dock that aligns with the Statement of Work and is located at 1200 Stanley Park Drive, Vancouver, BC V6G 3E2.

### Key Dates
* Expected start date for the contract: December 10, 2022 (Not a confirmed date, to be reviewed)
* Delivery deadline: June 23, 2023

## Contract Requirements

* Commercial marine craft (UNSPSC: 25111500)
* Vessel docking services (UNSPSC: 78141802)

## Evaluation Criteria

* Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

## Selection Process
This is a competitive tendering process where suppliers can submit their proposals. The evaluation will be based on the selection criteria mentioned above.

## Notice of Expiry
Please note that this tender announcement has expired since the deadline has passed. Further information may not be available.

I also ensured that the dates mentioned were accurate as per the original document, even though it might seem a bit odd to have a contract start date in 2022 while the tender was announced in 2023. Please let me know if you require any further assistance. 

Thank you. I'll be happy to revise anything that may be required.
